document_data.name: Umar
document_data.mainbody: '''Umar''', also called '''Umar the Patrician''', was the governor and commander of the military forces  of [[Port Ghaast]] in [[1359 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Umar was a competent and intelligent commander. He was easily frustrated by his troops' discipline or lack thereof.
document_data.Activities: Even though Umar knew that King [[Tharmakkas IV]] was a fool, he refused several treasonous invitations from prominent citizens of [[Murghôm]]. However, he did not report their activity to the king either.
